input.sentences: our group went bowling this weekend .
my friend bowled a strike nearly every time .
we got to pick which colorful ball we wanted .
i went with the dull lightweight one .
bowling shoes are little hotbeds of bacteria from other people 's feet .
output.sentences: We went on a bowling adventure this weekend.
On my first turn I got a space.
The bowling balls were either orange, blue, or red.
I always took the red ball, it was lucky for me.
